title: Olympics
content:
Hi guys,

Alright, we’re doing research on producing material for an Olympic bid.  
We do have some research collected, but there’s so much nice stuff out there i’m sure that you guys know of.

Anything from fonts made for different olympics, graphic manuals, moodshots, anything you can think of.

Our project is a winter olympic, but all the stuff that’s integrated into summer olympics are also relevant.

Typography is very interesting, i know there was a font at fountain.nu that was bought by (Vancouver’s?) olympic bid to be their proprietary font, but i cant seem to find it any longer.

Thanks!

author: cuidado

comments.content: Presuming it’s a Norwegian bid, why not use a Norwegian designed font system _or_ commission one.

If we get to be involved that late in the process, i’m sure that will be a very likely option. This, however is earlier in the process.

I did find some articles after searching typophile, but not many on the typography itself.
